name: Neon union
description: Chronic gossip is one of the two finalists of this collection. This type is characterised by constant depression, bad mood, and lack of purpose in life. It is distinguished by its acrimony, black humor and unwarranted gossip. Chronic gossipers love nothing but gossip and often it is their engine. Such people often find themselves in the yellow press or in the government. In old age, this species turns into harmless old ladies who work as museum supervisors and gossip not aloud, but also disgusting. Without this kind of gossip, I think the gossip would have worn off by the 18th century, so I got to hand it to the chronic gossip
